nodes.text: A Nolarian 6000 drill was a large piece of subaquatic mining equipment sold on the planet Nolar. In 39 BBY, there was a shortage of these drills. During that time, Quermian Dr. Murk Lundi attempted to purchase a Nolarian 6000 drill while trying to recover a Sith Holocron, only to have the dealer inform him of the shortage and that the mining safety committee was watching the situation.
The Nolarian 6000 drill was first mentioned in the 2002 young readers novel Jedi Apprentice Special Edition: The Followers, written by Jude Watson.
